text: Malvaloca may refer to: * Malvaloca (play), a 1912 play by the Quintero brothers * Malvaloca (1926 film), a silent Spanish film directed by Benito Perojo * Malvaloca (1942 film), a Spanish film directed by Luis Marquina * Malvaloca (1954 film), a Spanish film directed by Ramón Torrado
title: Malvaloca
